animal.question: I say 'Meow', love to chase mice, and purr when you pet me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧶 I love to play with yarn.
🐈 I have whiskers and soft fur.

animal.question: I bark, wag my tail, and love to play fetch. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I am a man's best friend.

animal.question: I quack, swim in ponds, and lay eggs. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I enjoy being in the water.

animal.question: I hop, have long ears, and love to eat carrots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I can be found in a burrow.

animal.question: I swing from trees, eat bananas, and make funny faces. What am I?
I am big and grey, have a trunk, and love to eat peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I use my nose to pick things up.
🌍 I live in Africa and Asia.

animal.question: I roar, am the king of the jungle, and have a big mane. What am I?

hints.text: 🐾 I am a type of big cat.

animal.question: I slither, hiss, and some of us are poisonous. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can be found in many habitats.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes, eat grass, and live in Africa. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 Every one of us has a unique pattern.

animal.question: I waddle, live in cold places, and eat fish. What am I?

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and often a bright color. Bees love me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 You can give me as a gift

plant.question: I am tall and strong, with branches reaching to the sky. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I have leaves that change color in the fall
🪵 You can make furniture out of me

plant.question: I grow underground, and some of my leaves grow above ground. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 You can eat me raw or cooked
🚜 Farmers grow me in a field

plant.question: I am green and grow along the ground. You can walk on me barefoot. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I need water to stay green
✂️ People cut me to keep me short

plant.question: I have prickly skin and a sweet inside. I grow in a desert. What am I?

hints.text: 🍉 My fruit can be many colors when ripe

plant.question: I am a yellow fruit. Monkeys like to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I turn yellow when I am ripe
🌴 I grow on trees in warm places

plant.question: I climb up walls and fences, wrapping around them as I grow. My leaves are often heart-shaped. What am I?
I have a woody stem but am smaller than a tree. People often plant me in their gardens to make them beautiful. What am I?

hints.text: 🌺 I can have many different kinds of flowers
✂️ People prune me to help me grow
🐕 I can be shaped into different figures

plant.question: I’m a seed that pops into a fluffy treat. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽I need to be heated to become my final form
🎬Many people like me with butter and salt

plant.question: I am a seed used to make chocolate. I grow on a tree in warm places. What am I?

hints.text: 🍫 I am bitter on my own, but sweet when mixed with sugar
🌎 I come from far away lands
